Auckland Airport drug bust: 52kg meth and cocaine seized https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-airport-drug-bust-52kg-meth-meth-meth-meth-and-cocaine-seized/gio4nedgkjfnhhhxmgy4pq3-sqzq/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-airport-drug-bust-52kg-meth-meth-meth-meth-and-cocaine-seized/gio4nedgkjfnhhhxmgy4pq3-sqzq/ A 24-year-old was charged after 2kg of cocaine was found in his suitcase. Mon, 14 Apr 2025 06:03:08 +0000 Unaccompanied bags located by Customs officers at Auckland International Airport in April 2025 were found to have vacuum-sealed packages of methamphetamine inside. Photo / Customs
